entry.title: From IST to KTH: How I Ended Up Studying Abroad in Sweden
entry.summary: A little over a year ago, due to my own interests but also some peer pressure from my friends and family, I started thinking about the possibility of studying abroad, either for the whole masterâ€™s, or only for one or two semesters. This is the story of all the twists and turns in my journey to end up studying in the MSc Cybersecurity at KTH, in Sweden.
